name: Lucas Alves Rego
aboutMe: I am a full-stack web developer with experience working on the development of an e-commerce platform integrated with the company's legacy systems, in addition to maintaining and creating internal and external applications, with a main focus on building high-performance and resilient front-ends.

skills.programmingLanguages: I mainly work with Typescript. Also confident with PHP and have notions of Go and Kotlin.
skills.frameworks: I mainly work with React and NextJS. NestJS for backend in NodeJS. For tests I use Vitest, React Testing Library, Jest and E2E with Playwright.

education.title: Formação
education.education: Instituto Federal de Educação, Ciência e Tecnologia da Bahia (IFBA - Informática)
education.courses: Fundamentals of Backend Engineering (Hussein Nasser), Fundamentals of Network Engineering (Hussein Nasser), Estrutura de dados e algoritmos + LeetCode (Augusto Miranda Galego), Elixir e Phoenix do zero (Rafael Camarda), Introduction to NGINX (Hussein Nasser)
